summary: The class provides a unique sentinel object that can be used as a distinct marker to indicate that a value has not been supplied, especially when None is a legitimate value. It creates a singleton placeholder that can be compared by identity to detect untouched or default entries.
business_intent: Enable developers to differentiate between an explicit value and an unspecified one in function arguments, configuration dictionaries, and other data structures, preventing ambiguity when None is a valid option.
